CustomField.formula: UPPER(LEFT(RIGHT(SuppliedEmail ,LEN(SuppliedEmail)-FIND("@",SuppliedEmail)),1)) & ": " & HYPERLINK( "/?sort=" & RIGHT(SuppliedEmail ,LEN(SuppliedEmail)-FIND("@",SuppliedEmail)), "", '_self' ) & HYPERLINK( "/" & Id & "?isdtp=vw", RIGHT(SuppliedEmail ,LEN(SuppliedEmail)-FIND("@",SuppliedEmail)), "_self" )
CustomField.label: Domain Name
